Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Loyola.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Armitage.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Armitage. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
